text: Apolinar is a 1972 Mexican fantasy drama movie directed by Julio Castillo and starring Aarón Hernán, Bertha Moss, Abel Woolrich, Ofelia Medina, Enrique Rocha, and Sergio Kleiner. ==Other websites== * Category:1972 fantasy movies Category:1972 drama movies Category:Mexican fantasy movies Category:Mexican drama movies
title: Apolinar
